title: Jupiter Transit in the 6th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Jupiter transits the 6th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus turns to discipline, service, health, and problem-solving. This phase supports ethical handling of conflicts, steady improvement in routines, and growth through consistent effort. Work responsibilities increase, but guidance and fairness help resolve disputes. Health improves with structured habits, though excess confidence in stamina should be avoided. When balanced, this transit strengthens resilience, practical wisdom, and long-term stability through service and accountability.
closing: This Jupiter transit builds strength through service and discipline. With balance, it brings resilience, fairness, and steady progress.
